verses.verse: Then <S%G2532><s%> came together <S%G4863><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> scribes, <S%G1122><s%> which came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with defiled, <S%G2839><s%> that is to say, <S%G5123><s%> with unwashen, <S%G449><s%> hands, <S%G5495><s%> they found fault. <S%G3201><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> they wash <S%G3538><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> oft, <S%G4435><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> holding <S%G2902><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> elders. <S%G4245><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they come from <S%G575><s%> the market, <S%G58><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> they wash, <S%G907><s%> they eat <S%G2068><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> there be, <S%G2076><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have received <S%G3880><s%> to hold, <S%G2902><s%> as the washing <S%G909><s%> of cups, <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pots, <S%G3582><s%> <S%G2532><s%> brazen vessels, <S%G5473><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of tables. <S%G2825><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G1302><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> elders, <S%G4245><s%> but <S%G235><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with unwashen <S%G449><s%> hands? <S%G5495><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> hath Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> honoreth <S%G5091><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with their lips, <S%G5491><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is far <S%G568><s%> <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> do they worship <S%G4576><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> for doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the commandments <S%G1778><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> laying aside <S%G863><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> ye hold <S%G2902><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> as the washing <S%G909><s%> of pots <S%G3582><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cups: <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> like things <S%G3946><s%> ye do. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Full well <S%G2573><s%> ye reject <S%G114><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may keep <S%G5083><s%> your own <S%G5216><s%> tradition. <S%G3862><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Honor <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mother; <S%G3384><s%> and, whoso curseth <S%G2551><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> let him die <S%G5053><s%> the death: <S%G2288><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> It is Corban, <S%G2878><s%> that is to say, <S%G3603><s%> a gift, <S%G1435><s%> by whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou mightest be profited <S%G5623><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> me; <S%G1700><s%> he shall be free.

And <S%G2532><s%> ye suffer <S%G863><s%> him <S%G846><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> aught <S%G3762><s%> for his <S%G848><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G848><s%> mother; <S%G3384><s%>

Making the word of God of none effect <S%G208><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> <S%G2316><s%> through your <S%G5216><s%> tradition, <S%G3862><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye have delivered: <S%G3860><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> like things <S%G3946><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> ye.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had called <S%G4341><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> unto him, he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Hearken <S%G191><s%> unto me <S%G3450><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> of you, and <S%G2532><s%> understand: <S%G4920><s%>

There is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> entering <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him: <S%G846><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the things which come <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> they that defile <S%G2840><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>
If any man <S%G1536><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he was entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> people, <S%G3793><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> parable. <S%G3850><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%> also? <S%G2532><s%> Do ye not <S%G3756><s%> perceive, <S%G3539><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever thing <S%G3956><s%> from without <S%G1855><s%> entereth <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> it cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> it entereth <S%G1531><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> but <S%G235><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> belly, <S%G2836><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> goeth out <S%G1607><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> draught, <S%G856><s%> purging <S%G2511><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> meats? <S%G1033><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3754><s%> That which cometh <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> from within, <S%G2081><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> thoughts, <S%G1261><s%> adulteries, <S%G3430><s%> fornications, <S%G4202><s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%>

Thefts, <S%G2829><s%> covetousness, <S%G4124><s%> wickedness, <S%G4189><s%> deceit, <S%G1388><s%> lasciviousness, <S%G766><s%> an evil <S%G4190><s%> eye, <S%G3788><s%> blasphemy, <S%G988><s%> pride, <S%G5243><s%> foolishness: <S%G877><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> evil things <S%G4190><s%> come <S%G1607><s%> from within, <S%G2081><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%> he arose, <S%G450><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> borders <S%G3181><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a house, <S%G3614><s%> and would <S%G2309><s%> have no man <S%G3762><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> it, but <S%G2532><s%> he could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be hid. <S%G2990><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a certain woman, <S%G1135><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> young daughter <S%G2365><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> and fell <S%G4363><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet: <S%G4228><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a Greek, <S%G1674><s%> a Syrophenician <S%G4949><s%> by nation; <S%G1085><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she besought <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he would cast forth <S%G1544><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1140><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G848><s%> daughter. <S%G2364><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> Let <S%G863><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be filled: <S%G5526><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children's <S%G5043><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> it unto the <S%G3588><s%> dogs. <S%G2952><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> she <S%G3588><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%> yet <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dogs <S%G2952><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> table <S%G5132><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children's <S%G3813><s%> crumbs. <S%G5589><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto her, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> go thy way; <S%G5217><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1140><s%> is gone <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> daughter. <S%G2364><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when she was come <S%G565><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> her <S%G848><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> she found <S%G2147><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1140><s%> gone out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her daughter <S%G2364><s%> laid <S%G906><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bed. <S%G2825><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> departing <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> coasts <S%G3725><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> through <S%G303><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> coasts <S%G3725><s%> of Decapolis. <S%G1179><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they bring <S%G5342><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> one that was deaf, <S%G2974><s%> and had an impediment in his speech; <S%G3424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they beseech <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> put his hand upon <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5495><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G618><s%> him <S%G846><s%> aside <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and put <S%G906><s%> his <S%G848><s%> fingers <S%G1147><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he spit, <S%G4429><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> his <S%G846><s%> tongue; <S%G1100><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> looking up <S%G308><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he sighed, <S%G4727><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Ephphatha, <S%G2188><s%> that is, <S%G3603><s%> Be opened. <S%G1272><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ears <S%G189><s%> were opened, <S%G1272><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> string <S%G1199><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%> was loosed, <S%G3089><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> plain. <S%G3723><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he charged <S%G1291><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they should tell <S%G2036><s%> no man: <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the more <S%G3745><s%> he <S%G846><s%> charged <S%G1291><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> so much the more <S%G3123><s%> a great deal <S%G4054><s%> they published <S%G2784><s%> it;

And <S%G2532><s%> were beyond measure <S%G5249><s%> astonished, <S%G1605><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> He hath done <S%G4160><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> well: <S%G2573><s%> he maketh <S%G4160><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> deaf <S%G2974><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dumb <S%G216><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>
